Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Kimball/Barry
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Kimball, Belmont, Kedzie, Diversey and Kimball near Kimball/Barry.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kimball, Belmont, Kedzie, Diversey, Kimball and over regular route, due to police activity near Kimball/Barry.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie/California Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kedzie/53rd
ShortDescription: Southbound 52 Kedzie/California buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 51st, California, 55th and Kedzie near Kedzie/53rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #52 Kedzie/California buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 51st, California, 55th, Kedzie and over regular route, due to police activity near Kedzie/53rd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
